newsitem.title: USA: MMI Cos Inc in $35.6 mln stock offering.
newsitem.headline: MMI Cos Inc in $35.6 mln stock offering.

text.p: MMI Cos Inc said Friday it expects to raise $35.6 million from a 2.5 million share stock offering priced at $30-1/4 a share.
The company said it is offering 1.25 million of the shares and 1.26 million are being sold by stock holders.
The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, inclduing support of increased premium writings and to fund possible acqusitions, the company said.
